subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Sergio Mitre went to the Brewers for a minor league outfielder, ensuring that Ivan Nova, Freddy Garcia and Bartolo Colon will make the opening day roster. Kevin Millwood will start in Class AAA.
snippet: Sergio Mitre went to the Brewers for a minor league outfielder, ensuring that Ivan Nova, Freddy Garcia and Bartolo Colon will make the opening day roster. Kevin Millwood will start in Class AAA.
